The Groza "Thunder" modular assault rifle was intended for various special forces in the Russian Army and Internal Affairs Ministry as a dedicated urban warfare weapon. It features a bullpup design with a 40mm grenade launcher located in place of the removable foregrip. The "Storm" is a heavy modification of the experimental Groza-1, featuring an extended magazine. It's a long-standing dream of every veteran Duty member given to only the most worthy of the group.
